description:
Upgrade your everyday wear with the top-rated 'Uniform' beanie. This classic cuffed beanie features the iconic Coal logo patch and is made with sustainable materials. It offers the perfect amount of stretch, ensuring it retains its shape over time.

  • Crafted from fine rib knit
  • Features a square-style classic Uniform patch for added flair
name: Coal The Uniform Beanie Mid - Unisex
